channel.title: Need help with client
channel.description:
ok so i client i got will let me on the server but will not let anyone els all it says for them is error connecting to server if anyone can fix the client for me that would be cool.
here the link to download the client the ip for the server is * if anyone wants to make sure it works. for all the mod's out there i am not trying to get anyone on my server at the moment i am still in beta and i dont want people on the server i just want the client to work
*
